text: Hugus ()Place-names in the Standard Written Form (SWF) : List of place-names agreed by the MAGA Signage Panel . Cornish Language Partnership. is a hamlet in west Cornwall, England, United Kingdom. It is three miles (5 km) west of Truro.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 204 Truro & Falmouth It is in the civil parish of Kea Hugus Chapel ==References== Category:Hamlets in Cornwall
title: Hugus
